snippet: The death of a Frenchman held by Islamist fighters in northern Africa was confirmed on Monday after the recovery and examination of the man’s body in northern Mali.
abstract: Death of Philippe Verdon, Frenchman held by Islamist fighters in northern Africa, is confirmed  after recovery and examination of man’s body in northern Mali; his death had been reported by Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb in March 2013.
lead_paragraph: The death of a Frenchman held by Islamist fighters in northern Africa was confirmed on Monday after the recovery and examination of the man’s body in northern Mali.

headline.main: France: Captive in Mali Is Dead
headline.print_headline: France: Captive in Mali Is Dead

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
keywords.name: organizations
